himselfe calling soule strict account manner soule hast thou done day good hast thou omitted evill hast thou committed good thou shouldst done evill thou shouldst done poore thou hast releeved sicke captive thou hast visited orphan widow thou hast comforted naked thou hast cloathed hungry thou hast refreshed afflicted desolate thou hast harboured soule shall demanded thee quid comedit pauper poorely wilt thou looke one poore man witnesse thy almes againe shall demanded thee vbi nudus quem amiti victi naked wilt thou appeare one naked soule speake thee againe shall demanded thee vbi sitiens quem potasti esuriens quem pavisti vbi captivus quem visitasti vby moestus quem relevasti soule forlorne wretched uncomfortable thy condition shall appeare much one witnesse thee expresse thy charity one poore soule thou hast releeved one naked thou hast cloathed one thirstie thou hast refreshed one hungry thou hast harboured captive thou hast visited one afflicted thou hast comforted veni
